# samsungcloudplatformv2_sqlserver_cluster (Data Source)

Show Cluster.

## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "samsungcloudplatformv2" {
}

data "samsungcloudplatformv2_sqlserver_cluster" "cluster" {
  id = var.id
}


output "cluster" {
  value = data.samsungcloudplatformv2_sqlserver_cluster.cluster
}

variable "id" {
  type    = string
  default = ""
}
```
